Fast Facts

Mission

One sentence, what is Spring trying to do?

Founders

Spring was founded by David Tisch, Alan Tisch, and Octavian Costache in New York.

Investors

Box Group, Yuri Millner, Groupe Arnault, Google Ventures, Thrive Capital

Brands

700+ brands use Spring, with dozens more being added every week (?)

Founded

2013

Location

Soho, NYC. (Soon moving to Flatiron for larger digs)

Employees

50+

Funding, to date

$34 million

Dogs

1-4, depending on the day
